column2: ThomasHpk, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I had two major artery blockages 5 years ago. Subsequent medical tests following angioplasty and stent placement revealed a hign Homocysteine level. Based on a family history of heart problems, my Doctors consider my case to be genetic. Folbic (2 per day) along with other blood pressure, anti-clotting and chlorlestoral medications were prescribed. I continue to take all of these medications and have had no reoccurances of vascular or heart problems.
